product_name: Pearl Izumi Divide Bike Gloves - Men's
long_description: Pearl Izumi Divide bike gloves supply full-finger coverage and a close-fitting, non-padded design for great control and feel. Soft, durable synthetic leather palms maximize comfort and grip. Polyester stretch fabric on back of hands wicks moisture and enhances ventilation; soft fabric on the thumb gives you a gentle place to wipe your nose. Anatomic palm construction provides an optimal fit around every curve and crease of your hand. Silicone grippers on index and middle finger tips offer enhanced grip. Rip-and-stick pull tabs on wrists close gloves snugly and ease removal.
short_description: Pearl Izumi Divide bike gloves supply full-finger coverage and a close-fitting, non-padded design for great control and feel.
